sub_title: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation
summary:
I'm passionate about purposeful leadership that drives sustainable growth and positive change. I believe in the transformative power of products and ventures that create a fairer and more enjoyable world.

Unraveling complex challenges is my forte, and I take pride in empowering teams with human-centered strategies. Throughout my career, I've led enterprise-level digital transformation programs, leveraging design thinking and data. I've worked with teams to create augmented reality mobile apps, craft award-winning multimedia editorials, launch campaigns, and build eye-catching websites. Collaborating with driven and open-minded individuals dedicated to making a positive impact is my source of inspiration.

projects.title: Huffington Post - Listen to America
projects.description:
- Best Awards Gold Award: Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites

In 2017, a team from HuffPost went on a road trip across the United States. They interviewed about more than a thousand people about their concerns for their communities, politics and economic future. The result was a comprehensive snapshot of opinions across racial, socio-economic and political lines from Americans from all walks of life. The challenge to us was to visualise this as an engaging digital experience, encouraging users to explore the many insights and points of view. 

The creative strategy was to create a seamless journey from one sound bite to another, emphasising the human element of the project by having portraits of the interviewees front and center. The line also serves as a metaphor for the road trip journey itself, and for the connections between people, places and ideas. The audio is stitched together so that each section can be listened to in isolation or explored quickly, simulating the chatter of a crowd.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: High Performance Sport NZ
projects.description:
- CSS Design Awards - Website of the Day May 4, 2018
- Awwwards - Site of the Day May 9, 201
- The FWA - Site of the Day May 21, 2018
- Best Awards Bronze Award: Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites

High Performance Sport NZ needed help telling the story behind their world leading performance system: a future focused, one-stop shop support network customised to the needs of each athlete.In the early stages of the project we worked in close collaboration with HPSNZ to immerse ourselves in their values and goals.

As a result, we were able to articulate their message in a coherent brand story that exposed the titanic job they do to the New Zealand general public. Our strategy and creative vision focused on showcasing their unique value proposition by emphasizing both the cutting edge, technical smarts of their organisation while maintaining an evocative, authentic and human face. We called it ‘winning doesn’t just happen’ and brought it to life by contrasting raw, emotional photography with graphic overlays and slick interaction design.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: Fonterra - From Here to Everywhere
projects.description:
- CSS Design Awards - Website of the Day Sept 21, 2017
- Awwwards - Site of the Day Sept 23, 2017
- Awwwards - Developer Site of the Day Oct 10, 2017
- Best Awards Bronze Award: Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites
- Best Awards Silver Award: Interactive Design - Interactive Marketing

New Zealand’s biggest company wanted to show how Kiwi innovation improves health and nutrition all over the world. As part of an integrated campaign, our job was to reinforce the new brand platform, “From Here to Everywhere” with a state-of-the-art take on stories of innovation.

We created an original interactive 3D interface with original copywriting, illustration, photography and video, for desktop, mobile and everything in between. A strategic imperative was to show New Zealand dairy innovation travelling “everywhere” in the world. To communicate that, we placed every story on a dynamic spinning globe interface that was prototyped, styled and deployed over a period of just three weeks. Visitors interact with this WebGL 3D world by spinning, clicking and exploring stories.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: Allpress Espresso Website
projects.description:
- CSSWinner - Site of the Day April 4, 2017
- Best Awards Bronze Award: Best Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites

The global web platform for Allpress Espresso delivers powerful e-commerce and multi-language content management in a sophisticated human interface. With a rich understanding of both the people and technology sides of the organisation, we designed a solution for Allpress that delivered scalable digital business tools, like multi-language, multi-currency e-commerce in six local markets, and on a platform that respected the brand’s clear and consistent global voice.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: DJ-808 - Serato
projects.description:
- Best Awards Finalist: Best Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites

DJ software giants Serato partnered with leading manufacturer of electronic musical instruments, Roland, to produce a first of its kind DJ controller with integrated drum machine and sequencer. Gladeye designed and built a standalone product page for the launch of the instrument, highlighting its unique features and driving pre-order of the item. 

I was involved as a client lead on the project, from initial pitch and proposal through to project management of the page build itself.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: NZ Olympic Team app - New Zealand Olympic Committee, ANZ (Major Sponsor)
projects.description:
- 58,000 downloads
- Majority of users returned to the app two or more times in a single day
- 4,394,000 total interactions
- 16,200 messages post to the starscape
- ANZ saw a 2 basis point growth in consideration in the months during the campaign
- Best Awards Bronze: Best Interactive Design - Applications
- W3 Awards Silver: Mobile Sites & Apps
- NZ Marketing Awards: Excellence Award - Best Use of Sponsorship 

The NZ Olympic Team app is designed and built around a central news feed which hosts exclusive daily highlights from the NZOC and SKY, NZ medal wins, behind-the-scenes videos and in-depth articles live from Rio. The emotional heart of the app features a 360° interactive starscape which enables a two-way conversation between Kiwi Olympians and everyday New Zealanders via stars in the night sky. 

Managed and lead project from end to end, including working closely with producer to scope costs and timelines, as well as collaborated with designers and developers to craft unique features and elements of the award nominated mobile app. Key client contact for both NZOC and ANZ during a very intense and high profile campaign period.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: For The Fans - KFC (Restaurant Brands)
projects.description:
- 37000 receipt codes entered
- 2000 prizes redeemed
- 80% event attendance rate

Gladeye created a curated hub of Super Rugby content and entertainment designed to bring fans of both KFC and footy closer together. In-store purchase receipt codes gave customers access to exclusive coupons and tickets to KFC activations at Super Rugby games. Introduced a points collection feature as an addictive layer of gamefication, which drove repeat purchase - all managed via a custom CMS for easy prize fulfilment.  

Involved at a concept and strategy level working closely with Account Director to prep and pitch the project. Managed development and delivery from end to end, serving as key client contact and sole project manager on the job. The website was the core of a successful sponsorship campaign.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

projects.title: America’s Most Admired Lawbreaker - Highline, Huffington Post
projects.description:
- 55,000 words, 15 consecutive launch days
- Best Awards Gold: Best Interactive Design - Large Scale Websites
- Awwwards Site of the Day
- Communicator Award: Websites - Publishing & Visual Appeal
- The Webby Awards Nominee: Best Individual Editorial Experience
- W3 Awards Gold: Websites - Publishing

Gladeye produced a globally recognised, award winning piece - exposing big pharma in the process. 

First project at the company, was in charge of client communication and content management for behemoth of a job. Worked with the team to strategically plan the structure of the site as well as manage client feedback and changes.

contributors.headline: Senior Director, Experience Strategy & Digital Innovation

profile_positions.description:
EPAM is a renowned global software engineering and IT consulting firm, offering its expertise across various industries such as finance, healthcare, retail, and technology. With its leadership position in IT services and a strong presence in Digital Commerce, CRM and Customer Experience Implementation Services, and Digital Marketing, EPAM stands as a trusted partner for clients in Europe and worldwide.

As the Director of Experience Consulting at EPAM, I drive the success of high-performing, multidisciplinary teams. With a focus on innovation, I lead the development and implementation of cutting-edge strategies that optimise consumer journeys and elevate brand experiences. Through a strategic mindset and navigation of complex organisational landscapes, I establish robust relationships with C-level executives and key decision-makers. 

Together, we achieve ambitious digital transformation goals, enhance customer satisfaction, and unlock revenue growth. My portfolio encompasses diverse projects, including digital strategy development, omni-channel experience optimisation, and organisation design. Notably, I have successfully collaborated with clients such as Bacardi and Ahold Delhaize, delivering impactful solutions that align with their unique business objectives.
profile_positions.title: Director, Experience Consulting

profile_positions.description:
Emakina is a full-service digital agency operating primarily across Europe and the Middle East. With eCommerce at our core, we deliver market-leading digital products, platforms and services for some of the region’s most interesting and complex businesses. In October 2021, Emakina was wholly acquired by EPAM, a 60,000 strong global technology and digital engagement practice.

I lead Emakina’s Experience Services, overseeing the Business Design team, as well as Service Design, UX Design, UI Design, Brand Design, Research, and Consulting. Together, our business unit, comprised of approximately 50 talented individuals, is dedicated to delivering strategic and creative services that elevate client projects to new heights.

In addition to my leadership responsibilities, I actively lead venture design, innovation, and strategy projects, leveraging my expertise to push boundaries and deliver exceptional results. As a member of the Executive Management team, I collaborate closely with the Managing Director to define and operationalise Emakina's go-to-market strategy. Together, we strive to define core service propositions that meet evolving market demands and foster business growth.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director Experience Services

profile_positions.description:
I joined Emakina.NL to build and lead a specialised strategy and innovation consulting practice at Emakina. Our team of 5 business designers take a holistic view of organisations, use design thinking methods to uncover opportunities for digitally-enabled commerce, ideate, test and validate strategic initiatives with our clients. 

We help transform companies from the inside out, expand our clients' portfolios of products and services in order to diversify their revenue streams, pilot innovative business models and relevant operating models to sustain them, steer large-scale programmes, and help businesses stay resilient in the long-term.
profile_positions.title: Head of Business Design | Client Partner

profile_positions.description:
AKQA is a digital innovation agency existing to create a better future with its clients, through the imaginative application of art and science. 

As Client Partner, I served as the ultimate client custodian, responsible for successfully maintaining and growing a large client portfolio by identifying and creating opportunities to add value to clients' business and AKQA. I am a trusted advisor and partner at the highest level, a champion and entrepreneur driving results for all parties.

The client partnerships I led were:
- Toyota Motor Europe across portfolio management, digital CX strategy, research, UX and data governance, product design, insights and analytics
- Colgate-Palmolive across new venture design, business modelling and strategy, creative concepting, user validation, service design, interface design, content strategy and data strategy
- Philips Home Care across digital brand design, commerce strategy and product development 
- Vodafone-Ziggo across CX strategy, innovation acceleration (advisory and workshop facilitation)
- Shypple across brand design and venture acceleration

Winner of AKQA Amsterdam "Teammate of the Year - 2020"
The award is described as "The pinnacle recognition bestowed to our MVLP (most valuable & loveable person). Quality, Innovation, Service, Thought are our values and no one represents these better than this person. They are collaborative, dependable, fun and inspiring. If you were to start your own agency this person would be top of the hiring list."
profile_positions.title: Client Partner

profile_positions.description:
In Feb 2020, I relocated to the Netherlands via a transfer to AKQA's Amsterdam studio. I took a step back to brace myself for a leap forward with the Amsterdam team, which operates as a customer experience strategy and design centre of excellence for the EMEA region. 

Arriving as a Senior Account Director, I took over stewardship of Amsterdam's largest and most complex account. Providing strategic, operational and commercial leadership across the Toyota Motor Europe partnership, I lead and provide counsel to senior clients and a 22 member AKQA team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Director

profile_positions.description:
My key client was Inland Revenue, which was in the midst of a Business Transformation Programme that sought to revolutionise the New Zealand tax system. AKQA was a key partner in helping IR deliver a future proofed citizen-centric experience through its multi-channel communications strategy. 

Our key projects included:
- Overall technical architecture, development and launch of both ird.govt.nz and taxtechnical.ird.govt.nz
- Research, CX design, UI/UX design, development and launch of IR Info Hub, an internal workflow management and CSR support interface 

I also led the Restaurant Brands (KFC and Pizza Hut) account, supporting a successful  e-commerce platform.

To better service my Wellington based clients, I relocated and established a satellite office of AKQA New Zealand. This included recruiting and hiring 6+ staff and managing day-to-day operations of the AKQA Wellington satellite studio. 

Winner of AKQA New Zealand "Quality Award - 2019" for best representing our value of "Quality" within the studio.
profile_positions.title: Client Partner

profile_positions.description: Winner of AKQA New Zealand "Fast Starter of the Year- 2018"
profile_positions.title: Account Director

profile_positions.description:
Gladeye is a multi-award winning digital agency with an emphasis on seamlessly blending design and technology. Passionate about solutions that empower and excite the end user, Gladeye crafts innovative and beautiful campaigns, mobile apps and websites.

My role involved nurturing and delivering projects at the bleeding edge of technology. This included collaborating on strategy and approach, pitching,  preparing proposals, briefs and Statements of Work.

Clients include: Huffington Post, Paymark, Les Mills NZ, KFC (Restaurant Brands), VTNZ, Vocus Communications (Slingshot, Flip, Orcon), Serato, ANZ, New Zealand Olympic Committee, Te Mata Estate, Allpress and Nissan
profile_positions.title: Account Director

volunteer_experiences.description:
Project Fearless works with young people aged 9-14, providing an inclusive and safe environment to learn, challenge and discover themselves. We provide courses and events across sport, leadership, art and more in Amsterdam Centrum, Nieuw-West and Zuid-Oost. 

I volunteer as the Website Editor & E-Commerce Manager, ensuring our initiatives are properly shared online and interested girls can easily sign up.
